author: hlship
msg: Allow defaults for parameters to be set inside the default constructor (or as normal field defaults).
Allow parameter fields to be read and updated even if the parameter is not bound (with no side effects).

author: bdaniel
msg: Applying Luciano's patch for TUSCANY-441 Remove DAS use of Class variable to trigger logging

author: sichen
msg: Replaced storeAll/toStore with service calls in createInvoiceForOrder.  Created a new service for it to use.  Fixes bugs where downstream operations in the logic requires upstream objects to be created first.  Test case: User captures a payment for a CC then generates invoice via shipment system.  Expected outcome is that payment is applied to invoice and if fulfilled, invoice is marked as paid.
